name: Air Venture Flight Center
about: Air Venture Flight Center, located in Olive Branch, Mississippi, is an FAA-approved 141 Flight Training school specializing in Private, Instrument, and Commercial/Multi Pilot Licenses. Our full-time trained staff of flight instructors, led by Chief Flight Instructor Natalie Bingham Hoover, a Designated Pilot Examiner and FAA safety representative, ensure a comprehensive and safe flight training experience. We offer a Discovery Flight package for $149, allowing you to take the controls and experience flying firsthand. Our program is designed to match you with an instructor suited to your schedule, providing a personalized learning environment. With a focus on quality and safety, Air Venture Flight Center is committed to helping you reach your full potential in aviation. Join us to embark on an unforgettable flying adventure.
